definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)

sentences.english: The cristae of the mitochondria are arranged closely.
sentences.chinese: 线粒体内嵴排列紧密，呈板层状。

sentences.english: Some mitochondria of the epithelial cells of renal tubules demonstrated vacuolation.
sentences.chinese: 肾小管上皮细胞线粒体肿胀空泡化。

sentences.english: Conclusion Uvarigrin induced apoptosis in KBv200 cells and KB cells probably through a mitochondria-dependent pathway.
sentences.chinese: 结论大花紫玉盘素可能通过线粒体通路诱导细胞凋亡。

sentences.english: Mitochondria were obtained by differential centrifugation.
sentences.chinese: 差速离心法制备肝线粒体。

sentences.english: The smooth outer membrane encloses the periphery of the mitochondria and the inner membrane is enfolded to form the cristae.
sentences.chinese: 光滑的外膜包围了线粒体膜外围和内属于包含形成嵴。

sentences.english: The arrangment of mitochondria was parallel to that of the myofibrils.
sentences.chinese: 线粒体含量丰富嵴密集，与肌原纤维基本呈平行。

sentences.english: The smooth surfaced endoplasmic reticulum, mitochondria and fat droplet almost disappeared in cytoplasm.
sentences.chinese: 细胞质中的滑面内质网，线粒体与脂滴几乎全部消失。

sentences.english: Muscle biopsy of him showed a large amount of Red-Ragged (RR) fibers and abnormal mitochondria.
sentences.chinese: 肌肉活组织检查可见大量不整红边纤维和异常线粒体。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical and pathological features of pure type mitochondrial myopathy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨单纯型线粒体肌病的临床和病理特点。

sentences.english: The myofibrils are also thicker and there are a great deal of mitochondrias and glycogenic granules between the myofibrils.
sentences.chinese: 肌原纤维间的肌浆中有大量线粒体及糖原颗粒。

sentences.english: This finding indicated that the cancers sometimes acquired mitochondria from their hosts.
sentences.chinese: 这个发现表明，肿瘤有时候从其宿主身上获得线粒体。

sentences.english: The mitochondrion is a machine within the cell that does the chemistry of breathing.
sentences.chinese: 线粒体是细胞内进行呼吸化学的一部机器。

sentences.english: Mitochondria are tiny energy units within eery cell of the body.
sentences.chinese: 在身体每个细胞中线粒体是很小的能量单位。

sentences.english: This model is a "mitochondrial" ridge-like structures extracted from the.
sentences.chinese: 这种模式是由“线粒体”嵴状结构中提炼而来的。

sentences.english: The chromatoid body combined with mitochondria soon after it was formed, and left the hollow.
sentences.chinese: 拟染色体形成后不久就与线粒体结合，并离开核凹。
